Title: Relates to reimbursing health care providers at the same rate for telephonic and telehealth visits
Summary: Reimburses health care providers at the same rate for telephonic and telehealth visits as in-person visits.
LawCode: Amd ยง2999-dd, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to reimbursing health care providers at the same rate for telephonic and telehealth visits as in-person visits
